sources.title: Crashout
sources.description: Title: Crashout Summary: The survivors of a prison break set out on an arduous journey to retrieve some loot. Directed by: Lewis R. Foster Actors: Production Company: Standard Productions Release Date: 1 March 1955 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 Convict Van Duff engineers a large-scale prison break; the six survivors hide out in a forgotten mine working near the prison, then set out on a long, dangerous journey by foot, car, train and truck to retrieve Duff's bank loot. En route, as they touch the lives of "regular folks," each has his own rendezvous with destiny.

metadata.Plot: Convict Van Duff engineers a large-scale prison break; the six survivors hide out in a forgotten mine working near the prison, then set out on a long, dangerous journey by foot, car, train and truck to retrieve Duff's bank loot. En route, as they touch the lives of "regular folks," each has his own rendezvous with destiny.
metadata.Writer: Hal E. Chester, Lewis R. Foster, Cy Endfield
metadata.Actors: William Bendix, Arthur Kennedy, Luther Adler
